vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰάσων, -ονος, ὁ
Jason: Act.17:5-7, 9; perhaps the same, Rom.16:21.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.17.5
§ Jason, "to heal"
Jason Acts 17:5-7 (3x), 9; Rom. 16:21*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Jasón: (1) un cristiano de Tesalónica ; (2) otro cristiano (ROM.16:21)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶孫 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "將要醫治的人"
一位熱情款待保羅與西拉的帖撒羅尼迦人,可能是保羅的堂表兄弟
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶孙 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "将要医治的人"
一位热情款待保罗与西拉的帖撒罗尼迦人,可能是保罗的堂表兄弟
